remarks.para: One may be inoperative provided L and R ISLN valves are verified to be operative.

placard.para: Placard below Captain’s PFD on P-1-1 panel: "L(R) DUCT PRESSURE INDICATION INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

maintenance.para: Perform the following Wing Isolation Valves Operational Check procedure to verify that the L and R ISLN valves are operative:

numlitem.para: Push the ECS switch on the EICAS Display Select Panel.
On the ECS Temperature Control (P5 panel):
Place the L and R ISLN valve switches to the closed position.
Verify on the ECS synoptic page that both Left and Right Isolation Valves go to the closed position within ten seconds.
Place the L ISLN valve switch to the open position.
Verify on the ECS synoptic page that the Left Isolation Valve goes to the open position within ten seconds.
Place the R ISLN valve switch to the open position.
Verify on the ECS synoptic page that the Right Isolation Valve goes to the open position within ten seconds.
